FuncDef: This command specifies the maximum number of MAC entries in the forwarding database (FDB) for the VPLS instance on this node.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the number of entries permitted in the forwarding database for this VPLS instance. Values-7450 ESS, 7950 XRS, or 7750 SR-7, SR-12, SR-12e: 1 to 511999.
